panels.title: Messages Sent to Socket per Minute
Queue Segments Created per Minute
panels.description: Rate of new segment files being created in the persistent queue (rotated when exceeding 10MB)

panels.title: Queue Segments Deleted per Minute
panels.description: Rate of segment files being deleted after being fully drained

panels.title: Queue Capacity Pauses (Backpressure Events)
panels.description: Number of times message consumption paused because disk queue was at 95% capacity. This triggers source disconnection to apply backpressure.
